title: Staff of Cherished Necromancy
content:
Harvest: When the wielder kills a hostile creature with a spell, they greedily absorb its energy and gain Life Essence until their next Long Rest.

Weapon Enchantment +2

Main Hand OnlyTopple

Unlike their father, Thibault, Cherish Hollow was not afraid of zombies. Cherish was afraid of sharia, liquoriee, wallpaper, Netherese artefacts, hats (large), the outdoors, the indoors, hats (small), and milk pails.

Quarterstaff Versatile

Staff of Cherished Necromancy is one of the Quarterstaff Weapons
